talks scheduled this week between the two Koreas

ldc_scope.charseq: Meanwhile, South Korean officials said Cabinet-level talks scheduled this week between the two Koreas looked unlikely to take place

extent.charseq: Seoul had hoped to use the meeting to try to persuade its communist neighbor

ldc_scope.charseq: Seoul had hoped to use the meeting to try to persuade its communist neighbor to scrap its nuclear ambitions

extent.charseq: Seoul had hoped to use the three-day talks to try to persuade its communist neighbor

ldc_scope.charseq: Seoul had hoped to use the three-day talks to try to persuade its communist neighbor to scrap its suspected nuclear program in return for aid and better relations with the outside world
The Security Council's ``handling of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula itself is precisely a prelude to war,'' the spokesman said

If the U.N. Security Council cooperates with U.S. efforts to ``stifle'' North Korea, it would leave the North with ``no other option but to beef up the deterrent force for war by mobilizing all the potentials,'' KCNA quoted the Foreign Ministry spokesman as saying

extent.charseq: North Korea has insisted on direct talks with the United States

ldc_scope.charseq: For months, North Korea has insisted on direct talks with the United States to negotiate a nonaggression treaty
But KCNA quoted the spokesman as saying that the U.S. invasion of Iraq showed that Washington was not bound by international agreements

extent.charseq: the United States plans to attack

ldc_scope.charseq: For weeks, North Korea has claimed that the United States plans to attack it after Iraq

extent.charseq: North Korea called off two working-level talks with South Korea last month

extent.charseq: North Korea on Sunday rejected the U.N. Security Council's plan to discuss

ldc_scope.charseq: North Korea on Sunday rejected the U.N. Security Council's plan to discuss the standoff over its suspected nuclear weapons development, calling it ``a prelude to war

extent.charseq: The Security Council is scheduled to discuss North Korea's nuclear program on Wednesday

ldc_scope.charseq: The Security Council is scheduled to discuss North Korea's nuclear program on Wednesday, and Pyongyang has said that any sanctions imposed on it will be tantamount to war

extent.charseq: South Korean lawmakers said they would work to quickly set up a special parliamentary committee

ldc_scope.charseq: Also on Sunday, South Korean lawmakers said they would work to quickly set up a special parliamentary committee to deal with the North's nuclear issue
